attributes.action: Taxpayer Funds Should Not Be Drawn Upon To Help Pay For Her Majesty's Jubilee Yacht
attributes.additional_details:
A yacht to commemorate Her Majesty's jubilee is a superb idea. What is completely inappropriate, however, is the notion that this may be paid for out of taxpayers' money, in whole or in part.
In times of great financial struggle and austerity, such a huge and somewhat unnecessary spend would be an abhorrent decision.
This petition calls upon the treasury to dispel all concerns the public may have regarding where this proposed £60m is coming from and clarify that public funds will not be drawn upon.
